address: 49 Do Doc Chan, Son Ky Ward, Tan Phu District, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
skills: Ability to recognize and understand others' viewpoints
Ability to work under extreme pressure
experience: Approximately 10 years of experience in freight services, specifically export operations, with companies such as FREIGHT SERVICES Company, TAL Logistics CO.,LTD, and ACL Logistics. Key responsibilities include: checking with agents for booking orders; negotiating schedules, ETD, ETA, transit times with agents and shippers; booking space with carriers; handling cargo release/hold requests; managing US/Europe/Asia/Consolidate shipments; overseeing consol box stuffing (measurement, container type, pre-alerts); handling Export/Import (Sea and Air), Courier/RF cargo/Air/Sea Freight/LCL/FCL rates for various routings (China/Asia/US-Canada/NonUs/MiddleEast/India/Aus); contacting carriers/NVOCCs for best rates; updating rate information monthly/weekly; checking and negotiating prices with shipping lines/airlines/co-loaders; working closely with sales teams and other internal teams; managing Free Time in POL/POD and resolving related issues; gathering market intelligence; building relationships with shipping lines, airlines, and co-loader/NVOCCs; coordinating with carriers to support the Trucking team (container availability); providing professional customer service; and dealing with internal/external customers via telephone and email. Also has experience in cost selling and new customer acquisition.
university: Foreign Economic Colleges at Ho Chi Minh City
